tasks.title: Design
tasks.description: Create a responsive design for the homepage. Use the latest design trends and best practices.

tasks.title: Implement Authentication
tasks.description: Set up user authentication using OAuth2. Grab the user's email address and profile picture from the OAuth2 provider.

tasks.title: Database Schema Design
tasks.description: Design the database schema for the new project. Define the tables, columns, and relationships. Add indexes and constraints for performance and data integrity.

tasks.title: API Integration
tasks.description: Integrate the third-party API for payment processing. Handle payment failures and retries. Implement webhooks for asynchronous processing.

tasks.title: Write Unit Tests
tasks.description: Create unit tests for the user service module. Test the CRUD operations and error handling scenarios.

tasks.title: Bug Fixing
tasks.description: Fix critical bugs in the user interface.

tasks.title: Code Review
tasks.description: Perform a code review for the latest feature branch.

tasks.title: Optimize Database Queries
tasks.description: Improve the performance of database queries.

tasks.title: Content Update
tasks.description: Update website content as per the new guidelines.

tasks.title: Prepare Deployment
tasks.description: Prepare the project for production deployment.

tasks.title: Design About Page
tasks.description: Create the design layout for the About page.

tasks.title: Implement User Profiles
tasks.description: Develop user profile features and settings.

tasks.title: Security Audit
tasks.description: Perform a security audit on the application.

tasks.title: API Documentation
tasks.description: Document all the API endpoints for developers. Include request and response examples. Provide code snippets for common use cases.

tasks.title: Setup CI/CD
tasks.description: Configure continuous integration and deployment pipelines.

tasks.title: Frontend Refactoring
tasks.description: Refactor the frontend codebase for better maintainability.

tasks.title: Code Documentation
tasks.description: Document the codebase for better understanding.

tasks.title: Optimize Images
tasks.description: Compress and optimize images for faster load times.

tasks.title: Add Analytics
tasks.description: Integrate analytics to track user behavior.

tasks.title: Database Backup
tasks.description: Setup automated database backup procedures.

tasks.title: Design Contact Page
tasks.description: Create a layout design for the Contact page.

tasks.title: Implement Notifications
tasks.description: Add push notification support for the app.

tasks.title: Accessibility Audit
tasks.description: Ensure the app meets accessibility standards.

tasks.title: Setup Testing Framework
tasks.description: Integrate a testing framework for unit tests.

tasks.title: Server Configuration
tasks.description: Configure the server for optimal performance.

tasks.title: UI/UX Review
tasks.description: Conduct a UI/UX review to improve user experience.

tasks.description: Document the technical architecture of the app.
